column4: W-We really did. W-What do we do? I've been thinking about it the whole day and…
Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
O-Of course. You're right. We're still students.
How would we even raise a baby? We're still kids ourselves.
It should be fine as long as I take the pill, right?
Yeah, it'll be just fine. I'll give some to you later if you don't have any.
Thank you. I love you, you always think about me.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: A-Are you sure? B-But we won't be able to cling together as much if I do.
Also, we're still kids, how would we even--
O-Okay, if you say so. I'll believe in you, since you always do what's best for us.
…Ah, just thinking about how we might have a family one day's making my heart race
